obfuscation: VIII .
original: VIII.

obfuscation: In the meantime a quieter so far even more spiritually poignant phase of the horror had been blackly unwinding itself behind the closed door of a shelf-lined room in Arkham .
original: In the meantime a quieter yet even more spiritually poignant phase of the horror had been blackly unwinding itself behind the closed door of a shelf-lined room in Arkham.

obfuscation: The curious manuscript record or diary of Wilbur Whateley , delivered to Miskatonic University for translation , had caused much worry and bewilderment among the experts in languages both ancient and modern ; its very alphabet , notwithstanding a general resemblance to the heavily shaded Arabic used in Mesopotamia , being absolutely unknown to any available authority .
original: The curious manuscript record or diary of Wilbur Whateley, delivered to Miskatonic University for translation, had caused much worry and bafflement among the experts in languages both ancient and modern; its very alphabet, notwithstanding a general resemblance to the heavily shaded Arabic used in Mesopotamia, being absolutely unknown to any available authority.

obfuscation: The final conclusion of the linguists was that the text represented an artificial alphabet , giving the effect of a nothing ; though none of the usual methods of cryptographic solution seemed to furnish any clue , even when applied on the basis of every tongue the writer might conceivably have used .
original: The final conclusion of the linguists was that the text represented an artificial alphabet, giving the effect of a cipher; though none of the usual methods of cryptographic solution seemed to furnish any clue, even when applied on the basis of every tongue the writer might conceivably have used.

obfuscation: The ancient records taken from Whateley’s quarters , while absorbingly interesting and in several cases promising to open up new and terrible lines of research among philosophers and men of science , were of no assistance whatever in this matter .
original: The ancient books taken from Whateley’s quarters, while absorbingly interesting and in several cases promising to open up new and terrible lines of research among philosophers and men of science, were of no assistance whatever in this matter.

obfuscation: One of them , a heavy tome with an iron clasp , was in another unknown alphabet—this one of a very different form , and resembling Sanscrit more than anything else .
original: One of them, a heavy tome with an iron clasp, was in another unknown alphabet—this one of a very different cast, and resembling Sanscrit more than anything else.

obfuscation: The old ledger was at length given wholly into the charge of Dr. Armitage , both because of his peculiar interest in the Whateley matter , and because of his wide linguistic learning and skill in the mystical rule of antiquity and the Middle Ages .
original: The old ledger was at length given wholly into the charge of Dr. Armitage, both because of his peculiar interest in the Whateley matter, and because of his wide linguistic learning and skill in the mystical formulae of antiquity and the Middle Ages.

obfuscation: Armitage had an idea that the alphabet might be something esoterically used by sealed forbidden cults which have come down from old times , and which have inherited many forms and traditions from the wizards of the Saracenic world .
original: Armitage had an idea that the alphabet might be something esoterically used by certain forbidden cults which have come down from old times, and which have inherited many forms and traditions from the wizards of the Saracenic world.

obfuscation: That question , however , he did not deem vital ; since it would be unnecessary to know the origin of the symbols if , as he suspected , they were used as a nothing in a modern language .
original: That question, however, he did not deem vital; since it would be unnecessary to know the origin of the symbols if, as he suspected, they were used as a cipher in a modern language.

obfuscation: It was his belief that , considering the great amount of text involved , the writer would scarcely have wished the trouble of using another speech than his own , save perhaps in certain special rule and incantations .
original: It was his belief that, considering the great amount of text involved, the writer would scarcely have wished the trouble of using another speech than his own, save perhaps in certain special formulae and incantations.

obfuscation: Accordingly he attacked the manuscript with the preliminary assumption that the bulk of it was in English .
original: Accordingly he attacked the manuscript with the preliminary assumption that the bulk of it was in English.

obfuscation: Dr. Armitage knew , from the repeated failures of his colleagues , that the riddle was a bass and complex one ; and that no simple mode of solution could merit even a trial .
original: Dr. Armitage knew, from the repeated failures of his colleagues, that the riddle was a deep and complex one; and that no simple mode of solution could merit even a trial.

obfuscation: All through belated August he fortified himself with the massed lore of cryptography ; drawing upon the fullest resources of his own library , and wading night after night amidst the arcana of Trithemius’ Poligraphia , Giambattista Porta’s De Furtivis Literarum Notis , De Vigenère’s Traité des Chiffres , Falconer’s Cryptomenysis Patefacta , Davys’ and Thicknesse’s eighteenth-century treatises , and such fairly modern authorities as Blair , von Marten , and Klüber’s Kryptographik .
original: All through late August he fortified himself with the massed lore of cryptography; drawing upon the fullest resources of his own library, and wading night after night amidst the arcana of Trithemius’ Poligraphia, Giambattista Porta’s De Furtivis Literarum Notis, De Vigenère’s Traité des Chiffres, Falconer’s Cryptomenysis Patefacta, Davys’ and Thicknesse’s eighteenth-century treatises, and such fairly modern authorities as Blair, von Marten, and Klüber’s Kryptographik.

obfuscation: He interspersed his study of the records with attacks on the manuscript itself , and in time became convinced that he had to deal with one of those subtlest and most ingenious of cryptograms , in which many separate lists of corresponding letters are arranged like the multiplication table , and the message built up with arbitrary key-words known only to the initiated .
original: He interspersed his study of the books with attacks on the manuscript itself, and in time became convinced that he had to deal with one of those subtlest and most ingenious of cryptograms, in which many separate lists of corresponding letters are arranged like the multiplication table, and the message built up with arbitrary key-words known only to the initiated.

obfuscation: The aged authorities seemed rather more helpful than the newer ones , and Armitage concluded that the code of the manuscript was one of great antiquity , no doubt handed down through a long line of mystical experimenters .
original: The older authorities seemed rather more helpful than the newer ones, and Armitage concluded that the code of the manuscript was one of great antiquity, no doubt handed down through a long line of mystical experimenters.

obfuscation: Several times he looked near daylight , only to be set back by some unforeseen obstacle .
original: Several times he seemed near daylight, only to be set back by some unforeseen obstacle.

obfuscation: Then , as September approached , the clouds began to clear .
original: Then, as September approached, the clouds began to clear.

obfuscation: Certain letters , as used in certain parts of the manuscript , issued definitely and unmistakably ; and it became obvious that the text was indeed in English .
original: Certain letters, as used in certain parts of the manuscript, emerged definitely and unmistakably; and it became obvious that the text was indeed in English.

obfuscation: On the evening of September 2nd the last major barrier gave way , and Dr. Armitage took for the first time a continuous passage of Wilbur Whateley’s annals .
original: On the evening of September 2nd the last major barrier gave way, and Dr. Armitage read for the first time a continuous passage of Wilbur Whateley’s annals.

obfuscation: It was in truth a diary , as all had thought ; and it was couched in a manner clearly shewing the mixed occult erudition and general illiteracy of the strange being who wrote it .
original: It was in truth a diary, as all had thought; and it was couched in a style clearly shewing the mixed occult erudition and general illiteracy of the strange being who wrote it.

obfuscation: Almost the inaugural long passage that Armitage deciphered , an entry dated November 26 , 1916 , proved highly startling and disquieting .
original: Almost the first long passage that Armitage deciphered, an entry dated November 26, 1916, proved highly startling and disquieting.

obfuscation: It was written , he remembered , by a child of three and a half who looked like a lad of twelve or thirteen .
original: It was written, he remembered, by a child of three and a half who looked like a lad of twelve or thirteen.

obfuscation: “Today learned the Aklo for the Sabaoth , ” it ran , “which did not like , it being answerable from the hill and not from the atmosphere .
original: “Today learned the Aklo for the Sabaoth,” it ran, “which did not like, it being answerable from the hill and not from the air.

obfuscation: That upstairs more ahead of me than I had thought it would be , and is not like to have much land brain .
original: That upstairs more ahead of me than I had thought it would be, and is not like to have much earth brain.

obfuscation: Shot Elam Hutchins’ collie Jack when he went to bite me , and Elam says he would kill me if he dast .
original: Shot Elam Hutchins’ collie Jack when he went to bite me, and Elam says he would kill me if he dast.

obfuscation: I guess he won’t .
original: I guess he won’t.

obfuscation: Grandfather kept me saying the Dho formula concluding night , and I think I saw the inner city at the 2 magnetic poles .
original: Grandfather kept me saying the Dho formula last night, and I think I saw the inner city at the 2 magnetic poles.

obfuscation: I shall go to those poles when the earth is cleared away , if I can’t break through with the Dho-Hna formula when I commit it .
original: I shall go to those poles when the earth is cleared off, if I can’t break through with the Dho-Hna formula when I commit it.

obfuscation: They from the air told me at Sabbat that it will be years before I can clear off the ground , and I guess grandfather will be dead then , so I shall have to learn all the angles of the planes and all the formulas between the Yr and the Nhhngr .
original: They from the air told me at Sabbat that it will be years before I can clear off the earth, and I guess grandfather will be dead then, so I shall have to learn all the angles of the planes and all the formulas between the Yr and the Nhhngr.

obfuscation: They from outside will help , but they can not take body without human blood .
original: They from outside will help, but they cannot take body without human blood.

obfuscation: That upstairs looks it will have the right form .
original: That upstairs looks it will have the right cast.

obfuscation: I can see it a little when I make the Voorish sign or blow the powder of Ibn Ghazi at it , and it is near like them at May-Eve on the mound .
original: I can see it a little when I make the Voorish sign or blow the powder of Ibn Ghazi at it, and it is near like them at May-Eve on the Hill.

obfuscation: The other side may wear off some .
original: The other face may wear off some.

obfuscation: I wonder how I shall look when the earth is cleared and there are no earth beings on it .
original: I wonder how I shall look when the earth is cleared and there are no earth beings on it.

obfuscation: He that came with the Aklo Sabaoth said I may be transfigured , there being much of outside to make on.” Morning found Dr. Armitage in a cold sweat of terror and a frenzy of wakeful concentration .
original:
He that came with the Aklo Sabaoth said I may be transfigured, there being much of outside to work on.”
      Morning found Dr. Armitage in a cold sweat of terror and a frenzy of wakeful concentration.

obfuscation: He had not left the manuscript all night , but sat at his table under the electric light turning page after page with shaking hands as fast as he could decipher the cabalistic text .
original: He had not left the manuscript all night, but sat at his table under the electric light turning page after page with shaking hands as fast as he could decipher the cryptic text.

obfuscation: He had nervously telephoned his wife he would not be home , and when she brought him a breakfast from the house he could barely dispose of a mouthful .
original: He had nervously telephoned his wife he would not be home, and when she brought him a breakfast from the house he could scarcely dispose of a mouthful.

obfuscation: All that day he took on , now and then halted maddeningly as a reapplication of the complex key became necessary .
original: All that day he read on, now and then halted maddeningly as a reapplication of the complex key became necessary.

obfuscation: Lunch and dinner were brought him , but he ate entirely the smallest fraction of either .
original: Lunch and dinner were brought him, but he ate only the smallest fraction of either.

obfuscation: Toward the middle of the next night he drowsed away in his chair , but soon woke out of a tangle of nightmares almost as hideous as the truths and menaces to man’s existence that he had uncovered .
original: Toward the middle of the next night he drowsed off in his chair, but soon woke out of a tangle of nightmares almost as hideous as the truths and menaces to man’s existence that he had uncovered.

obfuscation: On the morning of September 4th Professor Rice and Dr. Morgan insisted on seeing him for a while , and departed trembling and ashen-grey .
original: On the morning of September 4th Professor Rice and Dr. Morgan insisted on seeing him for a while, and departed trembling and ashen-grey.

obfuscation: That evening he went to bed , but slept entirely fitfully .
original: That evening he went to bed, but slept only fitfully.

obfuscation: Wednesday—the next day—he was back at the manuscript , and began to take copious bills both from the current sections and from those he had already deciphered .
original: Wednesday—the next day—he was back at the manuscript, and began to take copious notes both from the current sections and from those he had already deciphered.

obfuscation: In the minor hours of that night he slept a little in an easy-chair in his office , but was at the manuscript again before dawn .
original: In the small hours of that night he slept a little in an easy-chair in his office, but was at the manuscript again before dawn.

obfuscation: Some time before noon his physician , Dr. Hartwell , called to see him and insisted that he ended work .
original: Some time before noon his physician, Dr. Hartwell, called to see him and insisted that he cease work.

obfuscation: He defied ; intimating that it was of the most vital importance for him to complete the reading of the diary , and promising an explanation in due course of time .
original: He refused; intimating that it was of the most vital importance for him to complete the reading of the diary, and promising an explanation in due course of time.

obfuscation: That evening , precisely as twilight fell , he finished his terrible perusal and sank back exhausted .
original: That evening, just as twilight fell, he finished his terrible perusal and sank back exhausted.

obfuscation: His wife , bringing his dinner , found him in a half-comatose state ; but he was conscious enough to warn her off with a sharp cry when he saw her eyes wander toward the bills he had taken .
original: His wife, bringing his dinner, found him in a half-comatose state; but he was conscious enough to warn her off with a sharp cry when he saw her eyes wander toward the notes he had taken.

obfuscation: Weakly rising , he gathered up the scribbled papers and sealed them all in a great envelope , which he immediately put in his inside coat pocket .
original: Weakly rising, he gathered up the scribbled papers and sealed them all in a great envelope, which he immediately placed in his inside coat pocket.

obfuscation: He had sufficient strength to get home , but was thus clearly in need of medical aid that Dr. Hartwell was summoned at once .
original: He had sufficient strength to get home, but was so clearly in need of medical aid that Dr. Hartwell was summoned at once.

obfuscation: As the doctor put him to bed he could entirely mutter over and over again , “But what , in God’s name , can we do ? ” Dr. Armitage slept , but was partly delirious the next day .
original:
As the doctor put him to bed he could only mutter over and over again, “But what, in God’s name, can we do?”
      Dr. Armitage slept, but was partly delirious the next day.

obfuscation: He made no explanations to Hartwell , but in his calmer moments spoke of the imperative need of a long league with Rice and Morgan .
original: He made no explanations to Hartwell, but in his calmer moments spoke of the imperative need of a long conference with Rice and Morgan.

obfuscation: His wilder wanderings were very startling indeed , including frantic appeals that something in a boarded-up farmhouse be destroyed , and fantastic references to some plan for the extirpation of the entire human race and all animal and vegetable life from the ground by some terrible elder race of beings from another dimension .
original: His wilder wanderings were very startling indeed, including frantic appeals that something in a boarded-up farmhouse be destroyed, and fantastic references to some plan for the extirpation of the entire human race and all animal and vegetable life from the earth by some terrible elder race of beings from another dimension.

obfuscation: He would shout that the world was in danger , since the Elder Things wished to strip it and drag it away from the solar system and universe of matter into some other plane or phase of entity from which it had once fallen , vigintillions of aeons ago .
original: He would shout that the world was in danger, since the Elder Things wished to strip it and drag it away from the solar system and cosmos of matter into some other plane or phase of entity from which it had once fallen, vigintillions of aeons ago.

obfuscation: At other times he would call for the dreaded Necronomicon and the Daemonolatreia of Remigius , in which he looked hopeful of finding some formula to check the peril he conjured up .
original: At other times he would call for the dreaded Necronomicon and the Daemonolatreia of Remigius, in which he seemed hopeful of finding some formula to check the peril he conjured up.

obfuscation: “Stop them , stop them ! ” he would shout .
original: “Stop them, stop them!” he would shout.

obfuscation: “Those Whateleys meant to let them in , and the worst of all is left !
original: “Those Whateleys meant to let them in, and the worst of all is left!

obfuscation: Tell Rice and Morgan we must make something—it’s a blind business , but I know how to make the powder .
original: Tell Rice and Morgan we must do something—it’s a blind business, but I know how to make the powder.

obfuscation: . It hasn’t been fed since the moment of August , when Wilbur came here to his death , and at that rate .
original: . It hasn’t been fed since the second of August, when Wilbur came here to his death, and at that rate.

obfuscation: . .” But Armitage had a sound physique despite his seventy-three days , and slept off his disorder that night without developing any real fever .
original:
. .”
      But Armitage had a sound physique despite his seventy-three years, and slept off his disorder that night without developing any real fever.

obfuscation: He woke belated Friday , clear of head , though sober with a gnawing fear and tremendous sense of responsibility .
original: He woke late Friday, clear of head, though sober with a gnawing fear and tremendous sense of responsibility.

obfuscation: Saturday afternoon he felt able to go over to the library and summon Rice and Morgan for a conference , and the rest of that day and evening the three men tortured their brains in the wildest guess and the most desperate debate .
original: Saturday afternoon he felt able to go over to the library and summon Rice and Morgan for a conference, and the rest of that day and evening the three men tortured their brains in the wildest speculation and the most desperate debate.

obfuscation: Strange and terrible records were drawn voluminously from the stack shelves and from secure places of storage ; and diagrams and formulae were copied with feverish haste and in bewildering abundance .
original: Strange and terrible books were drawn voluminously from the stack shelves and from secure places of storage; and diagrams and formulae were copied with feverish haste and in bewildering abundance.

obfuscation: Of scepticism there were none .
original: Of scepticism there was none.

obfuscation: All three had seen the body of Wilbur Whateley as it lay on the floor in a room of that very building , and after that not one of them could find even slightly inclined to treat the diary as a madman’s raving .
original: All three had seen the body of Wilbur Whateley as it lay on the floor in a room of that very building, and after that not one of them could feel even slightly inclined to treat the diary as a madman’s raving.

obfuscation: Opinions were divided as to notifying the Massachusetts State Police , and the negative ultimately won .
original: Opinions were divided as to notifying the Massachusetts State Police, and the negative finally won.

obfuscation: There were things involved which simply could not be thought by those who had not seen a sample , as indeed was made clear during certain subsequent investigations .
original: There were things involved which simply could not be believed by those who had not seen a sample, as indeed was made clear during certain subsequent investigations.

obfuscation: Late at night the conference disbanded without having developed a definite plan , but all day Sunday Armitage was busy comparing formulae and mixing chemicals received from the college laboratory .
original: Late at night the conference disbanded without having developed a definite plan, but all day Sunday Armitage was busy comparing formulae and mixing chemicals obtained from the college laboratory.

obfuscation: The more he reflected on the hellish diary , the more he was inclined to doubt the efficacy of any material agent in stamping out the entity which Wilbur Whateley had left behind him—the earth-threatening entity which , unknown to him , was to break forth in a few hours and become the memorable Dunwich horror .
original: The more he reflected on the hellish diary, the more he was inclined to doubt the efficacy of any material agent in stamping out the entity which Wilbur Whateley had left behind him—the earth-threatening entity which, unknown to him, was to burst forth in a few hours and become the memorable Dunwich horror.

obfuscation: Monday was a repetition of Sunday with Dr. Armitage , for the task in hand asked an infinity of research and experiment .
original: Monday was a repetition of Sunday with Dr. Armitage, for the task in hand required an infinity of research and experiment.

obfuscation: Further consultations of the atrocious diary brought about various changes of plan , and he knew that even in the end a large amount of uncertainty must remain .
original: Further consultations of the monstrous diary brought about various changes of plan, and he knew that even in the end a large amount of uncertainty must remain.

obfuscation: By Tuesday he had a definite line of action mapped out , and thought he would try a trip to Dunwich within a week .
original: By Tuesday he had a definite line of action mapped out, and believed he would try a trip to Dunwich within a week.

obfuscation: Then , on Wednesday , the bang-up shock came .
original: Then, on Wednesday, the great shock came.

obfuscation: Tucked obscurely away in a corner of the Arkham Advertiser was a facetious little item from the Associated Press , telling what a record-breaking monster the bootleg whiskey of Dunwich had grown up .
original: Tucked obscurely away in a corner of the Arkham Advertiser was a facetious little item from the Associated Press, telling what a record-breaking monster the bootleg whiskey of Dunwich had raised up.

obfuscation: Armitage , half stunned , could entirely telephone for Rice and Morgan .
original: Armitage, half stunned, could only telephone for Rice and Morgan.

obfuscation: Far into the night they discussed , and the adjacent day was a whirlwind of preparation on the part of them all .
original: Far into the night they discussed, and the next day was a whirlwind of preparation on the part of them all.

obfuscation: Armitage knew he would be meddling with terrible powers , yet saw that there was no other way to annul the deeper and more malign meddling which others had made before him .
original: Armitage knew he would be meddling with terrible powers, yet saw that there was no other way to annul the deeper and more malign meddling which others had done before him.
